official_title: For the relief of The Umbrellas: Joint Project for Japan and U.S.A. Corporation.

summary.text: Treats certain entries of fabric wholly of polyamide as having been exported from the United States in accordance with and in satisfaction of the temporary importation bond and obligations of The Umbrellas: Joint Project for Japan and U.S.A. Corporation if specified conditions are met.
